reviewText: my husband loved the series as a boy, he was glad he found these dvds at such a low price.  We love the dvds.

Resolution is so poor, I've seen clearer images on silent films.

Still, it was good to see Michael Landon as a young boxer gone bad and William Boyett (from Highway Patrol and Adam-12) as a bad guy.
Same for the many lesser lights.  Fun to look them up in IMDb.

At the $22 price, it's probably a good idea to wait until full-year sets become available.
This would be a great addition to any collection.  I might be prejudiced because my Father-In-Law is John Doucette. Arrived promptly at a great price.
The video quality is excellent.  Great to watch this show again.  Good stories and like seeing the cars from the 50's again.

It looks like you are getting, the complete season on these DVD's, but you are only getting 4 episode per DVD.  I wouldn't have ordered these, had I known.  The  same way with the continuing series US marshals.  Only 8 episodes there.
This was a great add to the collection of older shows
This is just a routine cop show but if you live in Cochise County like I do, it is quite entertaining.
Somewhat simular to state trooper which I really like.
THEY DID NOT PLAY AND I FOUND OUT TOO LATE TO RETURN FOR A REFUND
just ought it & love it so much
